definitions.definition: To clean (a room, etc.) with a vacuum cleaner , irrespective of brand.
examples: I need to hoover this room.

definitions.definition: To use a vacuum cleaner, irrespective of brand.
examples: I'd hoover , iron or dust, but I hated doing windows.

definitions.definition: To suck in or inhale , as if by a vacuum cleaner.

main_definition: ( ambitransitive , British , Ireland ) To clean (a room, etc.) with a vacuum cleaner , irrespective of brand.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , British , Ireland ) To use a vacuum cleaner, irrespective of brand.
( transitive ) To suck in or inhale , as if by a vacuum cleaner.
